alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 16 at 2:55AM PST until December 16 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches are expected. * WHERE...Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for significant reductions in visibility at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow means there will be snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Travel is not recommended while the warning is in effect. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County
